text: Chillon Castle () is an island castle located on Lake Geneva (Lac LÃ©man), south of Veytaux in the canton of Vaud. Chillon is amongst the most visited medieval castles in Switzerland and Europe. ==References== Category:Castles in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Switzerland Category:Riviera- Pays-d'Enhaut District Category:11th-century buildings and structures
title: Chillon Castle
